The app "CFCN" is strictly for informational and entertainment purposes and in no way represents "Chelsea Football Club" or any other chelsea fan websites or their views. \n \n
The images, logos and names of the clubs used in the app belong to the respective clubs and we do not intend to infringe the copyright of any of these entities and we hereby credit them to the owner.
The external links that can be opened from the app in no way represents this app as an official partner or affiliate of the opened news portal or club website.
For any notices or copyright infringement issues, please contact us at webbisswiftapps@gmail.com so that we can resolve issues if any.

Chelsea Fan Club, Nepal is an unofficial Chelsea fan club from Nepal registered in 2016. We organize different events and match screenings and also various social works. Learn more about us and join us by clicking the link below.
Please select your country/region from the list. We use this information to show you TV channel information for upcoming matches.

If you don't see your country/region in the list, we currently do not support your region. Please select International to get live information from online and international media. 
 
 NOTE: You can select or change this option later from settings.
Don\'t show this to me again.
Notify me when new news and videos are available.
Notify me when match is about to start, generally minutes before the match starts.
Notify me about general match events (Kick off, Half time, Full time)
Notify me about match line ups.
Notify me about cards (Yellow card, Red cards)
Notify me about goals, penalties & misses.
